title: Orchestral Adventure Music Pack Vol. 1
description: Orchestral Adventure Music Pack Vol. 1 is a high-quality pack of 11 music loops written and recorded for royalty-free use in video games, created by composer Matteo Palmer.
longDescription:
This music pack contains 11 loopable tracks of original music written and recorded by composer/producer Matteo Palmer. These are professional, AAA-quality tracks, and fit perfectly for a variety of essential game types including 3D action adventure, RPG, platformers, and more. From heroic horns, epic percussion, and sweeping strings, this pack has exactly what you need for towns, battles, dungeons, and much more!


SAMPLES:
